com.github.epadronu.balin.config

Interface ConfigurationSetup

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Configuration

    public ConfigurationSetup

    This interface describe the different configuration options that can be used to customize Balin's behavior.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ConfigurationSetup.Companion
      Contains the default configuration setup used by Balin.
